name: Block Escape (spinner-web)
description:
Welcome to my small game for Trijam #204, with the theme "Blocked".

Gameplay:

It is a puzzle game, in which you need to control three aliens and help them reach the goal.

Controls:

  • WASD or Keyboard cursors to move your player.
  • TAB to switch between players.
  • Also basic controls for mobile (experimental)

Background / Game Idea: 

Thankfully, I had the game idea rather quickly and it was mainly about defining the game elements and the levels, etc.

I originally wanted to be within the three hours, and actually even had a playable game around that time, but there were still a lot of details missing. This is why I decided to skip the three hours limit and explore a thing I have not done so far, which is adding audio events to my game. I thankfully had an old Unity asset, which offered many good audio clips (although not everything fits perfectly, but good enough for a game jam I guess ;))

I hope it is fun, and also a bit challenging.

Enjoy :)
